data.name: D - Formation
data.desc: Each time a face-up "Destiny HERO" monster(s) you control is destroyed, place 1 D Counter on this card for each of those monsters. When you Normal or Special Summon a monster during your Main Phase: You can send this card with 2 or more D Counters to the Graveyard; add up to 2 cards from your Deck and/or Graveyard to your hand, with the same name as that monster.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
